name: Bush Fire Services, Inc.
description: Bush Fire Services, Inc. is a comprehensive service provider specializing in mobile shower trailers, mobile restroom trailers, mobile sink trailers, and transportation services. They provide disaster relief support, work water tankers (potable and non-potable), and transportation solutions for various events and emergency situations.
source: Verified from official website and business directories
eligibility: Commercial clients, event organizers, disaster relief organizations
notes: Rated 4.7 out of 5 stars on Google reviews. Provides mobile shower and restroom trailers for events and disaster relief. Also offers transportation services and water tankers. Additional contact: (606) 877-2994. Email: info@bushfireservices.com. GS-07F-061V contractor.
